author: elecharny
msg: Added a temporary class that will be used for search operation as a replacement for the default ClonedServerEntry. Some operation (probably rename) is modifying the ClonedServerEntry original entry, which is wrong and costly, as we have to clone it.
It's not anymore the case with this hack, that should be fixed as soon as we have fixed the deviant behavior.

author: gdusbabek
msg: give explicit cfid control to system CFMs. Patch by Gary Dusbabek, reviewed by Jonathan Ellis. CASSANDRA-1052

author: gdusbabek
msg: move ks/cf definitions into system keyspace. Patch by Gary Dusbabek, reviewed by Jonathan Ellis. CASSANDRA-1052
